title: Dalla largest Shabbat dinner unites – White Rock Lake Weekly
message:

This Shabbat, we stood together, not just in defiance of hatred, but in celebration of our rich and vibrant heritage.”The event commenced with Shabbat candle lighting, followed by a heartfelt prayer for the hostages still in Hamas captivity.

title: Rising Antisemitism in K - 12 Schools Demands National Attention
message:
As I walked through the US Capitol on May 8th — the day of the Congressional hearings on Antisemitism in K-12 schools — I was imbued with a sense of hope.
Since the appalling terrorist attack against Israel on October 7, reports of antisemitism in K-12 public and independent schools across the country have surged to shocking levels.
Disciplinary measures that were once seen as fair are now used selectively to target Jewish students, while their aggressors often face no consequences.
The hearing was a promising start, yet two hours is scarcely enough to tackle the widespread problem of antisemitism in schools.
As it stands, Jewish students and teachers are suffering, students are being indoctrinated, and our educational system is woefully unequipped to address these issues.

title: Israel Jewish humor show offers a serious message for a dark time : We will survive
message:
(JTA) — Israelis have long taken pride in two things: the long arc of Jewish history, and their relentlessly dark humor in the face of unspeakable tragedy.
Nearly every sketch in the show satirizes an event from millennia’s worth of Jewish and Israeli religious texts and history.
This week, we got our answer: In unprecedented times, “The Jews Are Coming” did something unprecedented: It got serious.
Its premiere a decade ago was delayed for months after a promo clip satirizing right-wing extremist murderers from Israeli history drew charges of political bias.
And decide what kind of generation you want to be: a generation that destroys or a generation that builds.
